```{r, message=FALSE}

library(ggplot2)
```

# Abstract

Here, I re-examine the analysis of Oeppen and Vaupel (2002).

This is summarizing the data to be clean
# life expectency Analysis
```{r}
data("gapminder_unfiltered")
gapminder_unfiltered %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  filter(lifeExp == max(lifeExp)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  select(year, country, lifeExp) %>% 
  arrange(year) ->
  sumdat
sumdat
```

#Edit your partnerâ€™s file to add code to create a scatterplot of year versus maximum life expectancy. Color code by country, and add a single Ordinary Least Squares (OLS) line.
